Straightshot nods.

" Right, I can do that, Uproar, you stay with Talon, an=
d make sure nothing harms her or the babies."

Uproar nods.

" You got it. =
 I'll stay right here."

Straightshot gets out into the corridor and heads =
to Nightlight's quarters.

" I gotta warn her.  Whatever is here could try =
ta get at her and Elita.  Oohhh if they try anything funny, I'm gonna peg t=
heir rear ends with every quill on my back!"

Local artist who specializes =
in illustration, using traditional and digital media.
